name: Aylin (Ilan Gonzalez Carigi)
description:
Trapped in a nightmare a little girl that is scared of the darkness has to find her stuffed rabbit to feel safe and wake up from this terrible nightmare. 

Use the radar sphere near Aylin to know the position of the stuffed rabbit.

There are 5 rabbits in total.

Avoid the darkness as much as possible.

Played with a game controller
